description.p: While holding this wand, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus each increase by 1.
The paintbrush has 10 charges, which are used to fuel the spells within it.

With the paintbrush in hand, you can use your action to cast one of the following spells from the brush: colour spray (2 charge or can up-cast by using an additional charges per level), aganazzar's scorcher (3 charges) or major image (4 charges). No components are required. Your spellcasting modifier is used for the attack bonus and saving throws.
The sword formerly wielded by the elven warrior Eirela Dread, this sword is now carried by her daughter, Serafina. As Serafinagrows stronger, so too will the sword.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
In darkness, the unsheathed blade of this sword. sheds moonlight, creating bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.
